title: SynEHRgy: Synthesizing Mixed-Type Structured Electronic Health Records using Decoder-Only Transformers
details: H Karami, D Atienza, A Paraschiv-Ionescu - GenAI for Health: Potential, Trust and Policy …
abstract: Generating synthetic Electronic Health Records (EHRs) offers significant potential for data augmentation, privacy-preserving data sharing, and enhancing machine learning model training. We propose a novel tokenization strategy tailored for …
